about_the_game:
Includes the Original soundtrack for Asura created by Orange Byte Studios in WAV format.

Contents:


  • 11 In-game Tracks (18 Min Approx)
  • wav Format

Tracks

  • Rise Of the Demon King (Main Menu)
  • The Attack Of Agman'garh (Level 1)
  • Wrath Of the Rakshasa (Level 1 Boss)
  • The Fall Of Van'killa (Level 2)
  • Vanara's Demise (Level 2 Boss)
  • The Tainting Of Hath'durga (Level 3)
  • The Sacrilege (Level 3 Boss)
  • The Whispers Of Nagr'gad (Level 4)
  • Mrytyu Mantra (Level 4 Boss)
  • The Invasion Of Jwala Mukhi (Level 5)
  • The Battle For Kurukshetra (Level 5 Boss)


Note: Soundtracks will be saved in your following folder location > ..Steam\steamapps\common\Asura\Soundtrack
